thread.section_title: Ticketbis opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Ticketbis | ticketbis.net
thread.title: Olivia Davies

author: Olivia Davies
title: Olivia Davies
text:
I ordered and paid for two premiership football tickets for my fella's birthday over 3 weeks ago. The tickets arrived only hours before the game leaving us with a panic to get there in time and having to cancel our hotel for the previous night. Even though they were guaranteed 48 hours before!
Then, we get to the stadium and our tickets DONT WORK! They are from a tout and we were refused entry after spending Â£170 on them! We then had to buy new tickets at great expense to get into the game.
Have ticketbis replied to my emails? Of course not!! Will I get my money refunded? I doubt it.
The worst thing; the ticket office at the football club said that ticketbis are well known for selling these shady tickets! How are they able to get away with this?
Disgraceful.
